name: I attempt to update the brand list using an unsupported method

steps.name: When I try to update the brands list using an unsupported method
Send a PUT request to the brands list endpoint
Then I should receive a method not allowed error
Verify response status and error message

fullName: Brand list management should reject unsupported operations: I attempt to update the brand list using an unsupported method

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Brand list management should reject unsupported operations
